titleStmt.title: The godly mans inquisition lately deliuered in two sermons before the right honourable Henry, Lord Montague, late lord high treasurer, priuie counsellor, &c. other gentlemen of worship, at Kimolton on their annuall feast day. By R. Preston, Preacher of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Preston, Richard, d. ca. 1624.

titleStmt.title: The godly mans inquisition lately deliuered in two sermons before the right honourable Henry, Lord Montague, late lord high treasurer, priuie counsellor, &c. other gentlemen of worship, at Kimolton on their annuall feast day. By R. Preston, Preacher of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Preston, Richard, d. ca. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Dawson for Iohn Bellamie, and are to be sold at his shop at the two Grey-hounds in Corne-hill neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
